Uses of Interface
com.samskivert.jdbc.ConnectionProvider

  • Packages that use ConnectionProvider 
    Package Description
    com.samskivert.jdbc
    Provides support services to applications that access relational databases via JDBC.
    com.samskivert.servlet
    Provides services and patterns that are useful in developing web applications.
    com.samskivert.servlet.user
    Provides services for managing a database of users in a web application or suite of web applications.

    • Uses of ConnectionProvider in com.samskivert.jdbc

      Classes in com.samskivert.jdbc that implement ConnectionProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataSourceConnectionProvider
      Provides connections using a pair of DataSource instances (one for read-only operations and one for read-write operations).
      class  StaticConnectionProvider
      The static connection provider generates JDBC connections based on configuration information provided via a properties file.
      Methods in com.samskivert.jdbc that return ConnectionProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConnectionProvider StaticConnectionProvider.forTest(String dbname)
      Creates a provider for testing, using HSQLDB.
      Constructors in com.samskivert.jdbc with parameters of type ConnectionProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      JORARepository(ConnectionProvider provider, String dbident)
      Creates and initializes a JORA repository which will access the database identified by the supplied database identifier.
      Repository(ConnectionProvider provider)
      Creates and initializes the repository.
      SimpleRepository(ConnectionProvider provider, String dbident)
      Creates and initializes a simple repository which will access the database identified by the supplied database identifier.
      TransitionRepository(ConnectionProvider conprov)
      Construct a TransitionRepository for the server.

    • Uses of ConnectionProvider in com.samskivert.servlet

      Constructors in com.samskivert.servlet with parameters of type ConnectionProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBCTableSiteIdentifier(ConnectionProvider conprov)
      Constructs a JDBC table site identifier with the supplied connection provider from which to obtain its database connection.
      JDBCTableSiteIdentifier(ConnectionProvider conprov, int defaultSiteId)
      Creates an identifier that will load data from the supplied connection provider and which will use the supplied default site id instead of SiteIdentifier.DEFAULT_SITE_ID.

    • Uses of ConnectionProvider in com.samskivert.servlet.user

      Methods in com.samskivert.servlet.user with parameters of type ConnectionProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UserManager.init(Properties config, ConnectionProvider conprov)
      Prepares this user manager for operation.
      void UserManager.init(Properties config, ConnectionProvider conprov, RunQueue pruneQueue)
      Prepares this user manager for operation.
      Constructors in com.samskivert.servlet.user with parameters of type ConnectionProvider 
      Constructor and Description
      UserRepository(ConnectionProvider provider)
      Creates the repository and opens the user database.
